page.title: 20LINDOW SCHOOL, WILMSLOW
page.content: Lindow County Primary School, a { semi-open plan building}opened in 1970.It has 2 units for hearing impaired pupils, opened in 1976. There are six classes containing{193 {pupils}in total, 17 hearing impaired. There are 11 teachers all together, 4 of whom work in the unit. Subjects include: English, French, Maths, Science, Geography, Art and Craft, Music, Computer, Sport and P.E. { CONTRIBUTORS TO THE DOMESDAY PROJECT: {Mark A. Mark B. Stephen B. Paul D. {Daniel F. Mark H. Peter H. Matthew L. {Douglas B. Christopher N. Simon P. {Simon T. James W. Robert W>. Stuart T. {Daniel P. Daniel B. Lewis H. Carolyn A {Jennifer A. Susanna B. Gail B. Kim F. {Kate G. Zoe L. Samantha L. Catherine P {Katie S. Sally S. Amanda S. Lisa W. {Leandra H. Jenny S. Sarah D. Tara H. {Nichola K. Alison R. Tony M.
